About the App

Built from the code for SimpleBluetoothLeTerminal and SimpleBluetoothTerminal by Kai Morich, this app allows for connecting Bluetooth RSM (remote speaker mic) and PTT buttons to app functions through the use of Android Intents dynamically using driver definitions.
